channel.title: replacement on My Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in replacement on My Hugo

item.title: Deprecated Linux Commands And Their Replacements
item.description: Debian 9 Network Deprecated Command Replacement Command(s) arp ip n (ip neighbor) ifconfig ip a (ip addr), ip link, ip -s (ip -stats) iptunnel ip tunnel iwconfig iw nameif ip link, ifrename netstat ss, ip route (for netstat -r), ip -s link (for netstat -i), ip maddr (for netstat -g) route ip r (ip route) Source: Doug Vitale Tech Blog
